extensionDescription.message: Overrides YouTube autoplay, so that the user can filter the following videos.

extensionConfiguration.description: The name of the pop-up window.

extensionOptionsDescription.message: Configure the behavior and appearance of the KeepTheTrack extension.

extensionOptionSliderLabel.description: Label for the sleep overlay delay slider.

extensionOptionSliderValue.description: Label for the sleep overlay delay slider value.

extensionOptionOpacitySliderLabel.description: Label for the sleep mode opacity slider.

extensionOptionOpacitySliderValue.description: Label for the sleep mode opacity slider value.

extensionOptionColorPickerLabel.description: Label for the sleep mode color picker.

extensionOptionResetButton.description: Button to reset settings to default values.

extensionResetWarning.message: Are you sure you want to reset settings to default?
extensionResetWarning.description: Confirmation message before resetting settings to default values.

extensionOptionImportButton.description: Button to import settings from a file.

extensionOptionExportButton.description: Button to export settings to a file.

extensionOptionImportError.message: An error occurred while importing the file.
extensionOptionImportError.description: Error message displayed when there is an issue importing settings.
